name: 1000 Steps
description:
1000 Steps Materialize as an embodiment of good Ascend to the Underworld and become it's king. Defeat the sharks. Get defeated, and undefeated, or sealed in an eternal prison, or just restart. Defeat the darkness and save the world.

Note, this game is a work in progress. Expect many changes to occur before it is complete. If you want me to keep working on the game, give it a good rating or give me your ideas!

Israel Ownbey · 1000 Steps OST
